<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set asset status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/bulk/set-status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates lifecycle status for multiple assets in a single operation. Use this for mass status changes like retiring old devices, marking assets for repair, or activating new inventory.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify assets and extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. **AssetStatusTypeId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) and read `Items[].Status.AssetStatusTypeId` to get valid status type UUIDs.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for assets to update: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with current status filter.
2. Identify target status from existing asset data or configuration.
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/bulk/set-status](/docs/api/assets/bulk-set-asset-status) with AssetIds and target AssetStatusTypeId.

**Minimal Required Fields**: AssetIds array, AssetStatusTypeId

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"AssetIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"type":"object","properties":{"AssetStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}},"title":"BulkSetAssetStatusRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

</StatusCodes>
